features.title: Multi-Account Support

features.title: Multi-Currency

features.title: Automated Insights

howItWorks.title: 1. Create Your Account

howItWorks.title: 2. Track Your Spending
howItWorks.description: Automatically categorize and track your transactions in real-time

howItWorks.title: 3. Get Insights
howItWorks.description: Receive AI-powered insights and recommendations to optimize your finances

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: Trakeo has transformed how I manage my business finances. The AI insights have helped me identify cost-saving opportunities I never knew existed.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: The receipt scanning feature saves me hours each month. Now I can focus on my work instead of manual data entry and expense tracking.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.quote: I recommend Trakeo to all my clients. The multi-currency support and detailed analytics make it perfect for international investors.
